content: My plant is a small herb plant, and it was struggling because I had forgotten to water it for weeks. I'm glad I was able to revive it. Speaking of herbs, I need to water my herb garden, it's been a few days since I last did. Do you have any tips on how to organize my bookshelf? I finally cleared out a section and donated about 20 books to the local library last month, but it's still a bit cluttered.
